# m-form-check



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute       | Description                                          | Type                                                                             | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `checked`           | `checked`       | Checkbox is checked                                  | `boolean`                                                                        | `false`     |
| `disabled`          | `disabled`      | Disabled state                                       | `boolean`                                                                        | `false`     |
| `indeterminate`     | `indeterminate` | If checkbox is indeterminated                        | `boolean \| undefined`                                                           | `undefined` |
| `label`             | `label`         | The text to display in the Check/Radio.              | `string \| undefined`                                                            | `undefined` |
| `mId` _(required)_  | `m-id`          | Form control identifier                              | `string`                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `name`              | `name`          | The text to display in the Check/Radio.              | `string \| undefined`                                                            | `undefined` |
| `state`             | `state`         | State of checkbox: Succeess, Error, Warning, Loading | `"error" \| "indeterminate" \| "loading" \| "success" \| "warning" \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `type` _(required)_ | `type`          | The text to display in the Check/Radio.              | `"checkbox" \| "radio"`                                                          | `undefined` |
